metadata.title: CVE-2020-26966 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low
metadata.description: Searching for a single word from the address bar caused an mDNS request tobe sent on the local network searching for a hostname consisting of thatstring; resulting in an information leak. *Note: This issue only affectedWindows operating systems. Other operating systems are unaffected.*. Thisvulnerability affects Firefox < 83, Firefox ESR < 78.5, and Thunderbird <78.5.

criterions.comment: mozjs38 package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs52 package in esm-infra/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
